verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: WASHINGTON—] [ARG0: Trump] [V: cancels] [ARG1: June 12 summit with North Korea 's Kim] , [ARGM-ADV: citing ' tremendous anger and open hostility ' in recent statement] .
[ARG0: WASHINGTON— Trump] cancels June 12 summit with North Korea 's Kim , [V: citing] [ARG1: ' tremendous anger and open hostility '] [ARGM-LOC: in recent statement] .
